title: Blood moon Kalista Texture bug
body: I've been playing a lot of {{champion:429}} lately and on her blood moon skin when you do her /t /L and /j her mask turns a dark purple I tried this with her classic skin and Championship skin those ones are fine I know its something small but still thought I'd post it here.

replies.body:
Hey TheLycan,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix.
Okay just wanted to make sure you guys knew :) thanks for letting me know.
No worries! It won't be fixed for 5.21, but we're looking at having this resolved for the following patch if everything goes according to planned. :]
